original_text: Your sons and your daughters shall be given to another people, while your eyes look on and fail with longing for them all day long, but you shall be helpless.
korean_text: 네 자녀를 다른 민족에게 빼앗기고 종일 생각하고 찾음으로 눈이 피곤하여지나 네 손에 힘이 없을 것이며

sentences.original_text: Your sons and your daughters shall be given to another people
sentences.korean_translation: 네 아들들과 딸들이 다른 백성에게 넘겨질 것이다

sentences.original_text: and fail with longing for them
